name: Edools Tecnologias Educacionais LTDA
description: Operator of an online learning platform. The company delivers an online platform that takes care of management videos and documents, students management, e-commerce integration, scalability, customization of appearance and provides an API for integration with third party services.
one_liner: Operator of an online learning platform. The company delivers an online platform that takes care of management videos and documents, students management, e-commerce integration, scalability, customization of appearance and provides an API for integration with third party services.
